LanguageData.Squirrel.label: squirrel
LanguageData.Squirrel.description: One of the many hardy, versatile rodent species that follows humankind everywhere it spreads.
LanguageData.Squirrel_Leather.label: squirrelskin
LanguageData.Squirrel_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a squirrel.
LanguageData.Squirrel_Meat.label: squirrel meat
LanguageData.Squirrel_Corpse.label: squirrel corpse
LanguageData.Squirrel.label: squirrel
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.label: alphabeaver
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.description: A large beaver derivative genetically engineered to harvest wood with machine-like efficiency. In the absence of specialized feed, these animals will enter a manic state that compels them to eat trees whole.
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Leather.label: beaverskin
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a alphabeaver.
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Meat.label: alphabeaver meat
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Corpse.label: alphabeaver corpse
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.label: alphabeaver
LanguageData.Capybara.label: capybara
LanguageData.Capybara.description: The largest natural rodent, the capybara is well-adapted for steaming jungle.
LanguageData.Capybara_Leather.label: capybaraskin
LanguageData.Capybara_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a capybara.
LanguageData.Capybara_Meat.label: capybara meat
LanguageData.Capybara_Corpse.label: capybara corpse
LanguageData.Capybara.label: capybara
LanguageData.Chinchilla.label: chinchilla
LanguageData.Chinchilla.description: A small but quick rodent famous for its exceptionally soft fur.
LanguageData.Chinchilla_Leather.label: chinchilla fur
LanguageData.Chinchilla_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a chinchilla.
LanguageData.Chinchilla_Meat.label: chinchilla meat
LanguageData.Chinchilla_Corpse.label: chinchilla corpse
LanguageData.Chinchilla.label: chinchilla
LanguageData.Boomrat.label: boomrat
LanguageData.Boomrat.description: Either by deliberate genetic weaponization, or as an unusual defense mechanism, these rodent-like creatures create a powerful fire-starting explosion when killed.
LanguageData.Boomrat_Leather.label: boomrat leather
LanguageData.Boomrat_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a boomrat.
LanguageData.Boomrat_Meat.label: boomrat meat
LanguageData.Boomrat_Corpse.label: boomrat corpse
LanguageData.Boomrat.label: boomrat
LanguageData.Raccoon.label: Raccoon
LanguageData.Raccoon.description: A small, hardy animal that ranges wide across forests and shrubland. Eats almost anything.
LanguageData.Raccoon_Leather.label: Raccoon leather
LanguageData.Raccoon_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a Raccoon.
LanguageData.Raccoon_Meat.label: Raccoon meat
LanguageData.Raccoon_Corpse.label: Raccoon corpse
LanguageData.Raccoon.label: raccoon
LanguageData.Rat.label: rat
LanguageData.Rat.description: A rodent famous for soiling kitchens and spreading disease. Eats almost anything; lives almost anywhere.
LanguageData.Rat_Leather.label: rat leather
LanguageData.Rat_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a rat.
LanguageData.Rat_Meat.label: rat meat
LanguageData.Rat_Corpse.label: rat corpse
